languages.text: {n}Джай несколько минут сверлит игровое поле взглядом, то постукивая {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}аугментированным пальцем{/g} по его краю, то принимаясь насвистывать что-то совсем не похожее на мелодию флейтиста. Крыса трижды почти закатывает шарик в лунку, но каждый раз он проскальзывает мимо.{/n}

{n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Джай несколько минут сверлит игровое поле взглядом, то постукивая {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}аугментированным пальцем{/g} по его краю, то принимаясь насвистывать что-то совсем не похожее на мелодию флейтиста. Крыса трижды почти закатывает шарик в лунку, но каждый раз он проскальзывает мимо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, sometimes tapping her augmented finger on the edge, sometimes whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the pocket not one but three times, and yet misses the mark every time.{/n}

{n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, sometimes tapping her augmented finger on the edge, sometimes whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the pocket not one but three times, and yet misses the mark every time.{/n}

The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

{n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her augmented finger on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

{n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

{n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae fixe le plateau pendant plusieurs minutes. Elle commence par tapoter de ses {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}doigts augmentés{/g} le bord de la caisse, puis se met à siffler un air complètement différent de celui du joueur de flûte. Une fois, deux fois, trois fois, le rat s'approche du trou et semble à deux doigts de faire rouler la bille dedans, mais finit par manquer sa cible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae fixe le plateau pendant plusieurs minutes. Elle commence par tapoter de ses doigts augmentés le bord de la caisse, puis se met à siffler un air complètement différent de celui du joueur de flûte. Une fois, deux fois, trois fois, le rat s'approche du trou et semble à deux doigts de faire rouler la bille dedans, mais finit par manquer sa cible.{/n}

{n}Jae fixe le plateau pendant plusieurs minutes. Elle commence par tapoter de ses doigts augmentés le bord de la caisse, puis se met à siffler un air complètement différent de celui du joueur de flûte. Une fois, deux fois, trois fois, le rat s'approche du trou et semble à deux doigts de faire rouler la bille dedans, mais finit par manquer sa cible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae observa el tablero con detenimiento durante varios minutos, primero golpeteando el borde con el {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}dedo aumentado{/g} y luego silbando una melodía marcadamente distinta a la que interpreta el flautista. La rata está a punto de introducir la bola por el orificio no en una, sino en tres ocasiones, pero al final siempre pasa de largo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae observa el tablero con detenimiento durante varios minutos, primero golpeteando el borde con el dedo y luego silbando una melodía marcadamente distinta a la que interpreta el flautista. La rata está a punto de introducir la bola por el orificio no en una, sino en tres ocasiones, pero al final siempre pasa de largo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイは数分間、遊戯盤を睨みつけて、{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}オーグメントの指{/g}でボードの縁をたたいたり、フルート吹きとはまったく違うメロディで口笛を吹いたりした。ネズミは一度ならず三度もボールを穴に転がしそうになったが、結局毎回、穴を外してしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは数分間、遊戯盤を睨みつけて、オーグメントの指でボードの縁をたたいたり、フルート吹きとはまったく違うメロディで口笛を吹いたりした。ネズミは一度ならず三度もボールを穴に転がしそうになったが、結局毎回、穴を外してしまう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}婕伊盯着游戏板看了好几分钟，用{g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}手指{/g}交替着敲打着游戏板边缘，演奏出了与吹笛人的笛声截然不同的曲调。那只老鼠有整整三次差点把球推进洞里，但还是在最后一刻与目标失之交臂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊盯着游戏板看了好几分钟，用手指交替着敲打着游戏板边缘，演奏出了与吹笛人的笛声截然不同的曲调。那只老鼠有整整三次差点把球推进洞里，但还是在最后一刻与目标失之交臂。{/n}
{n}婕伊盯着游戏板看了好几分钟，用手指交替着敲打着游戏板边缘，演奏出了与吹笛人的笛声截然不同的曲调。那只老鼠有整整三次差点把球推进洞里，但还是在最后一刻与目标失之交臂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae starrt mehrere Minuten lang auf das Brett und schnippt dabei ihren {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmentierten Finger{/g} gegen die Kante oder pfeift abwechselnd eine völlig andere Melodie als die des Flötenspielers. Die Ratte schiebt die Kugel insgesamt dreimal fast in das Loch, scheitert aber immer kurz davor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}

Die Ratte schiebt die Kugel insgesamt dreimal fast in das Loch, scheitert aber immer kurz davor.{/n}

{n}Jae starrt mehrere Minuten lang auf das Brett und schnippt dabei ihren augmentierten Finger gegen die Kante oder pfeift abwechselnd eine völlig andere Melodie als die des Flötenspielers. Die Ratte schiebt die Kugel insgesamt dreimal fast in das Loch, scheitert aber immer kurz davor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae, gözlerini dakikalarca tahtaya dikiyor. {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}Ogmentli parmağını{/g} kasanın kenarına vurmak ve ıslığıyla flütçününkine kıyasla oldukça farklı bir melodi tutturmak arasında gidip geliyor. Sıçan; yalnızca bir kez değil, tam üç kez topu deliğe yuvarlamaya yaklaşıyor ancak her seferinde hedefi ıskalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae glares at the board for several minutes, alternating between tapping her {g|Encyclopedia:AugmentationGlossary}augmented finger{/g} on the edge and whistling a starkly different tune to that of the flute player. The rat comes close to rolling the ball into the hole not once but three times, and yet ends up missing the mark every time.{/n}
